<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Nocturnal Kindred](/Feats.aspx?ID=3548) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Book of the Dead](/Sources.aspx?ID=118) pg. 58</row>

**Archetype** [Vampire](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=181)

**Prerequisites**
[Vampire Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3545)

</column>

---

You have an innate connection with other creatures of the night and understand some of them. You can ask questions of, receive answers from, and use [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) with bats, rats, and wolves. You also gain a +1 circumstance bonus to [Make an Impression](/Actions.aspx?ID=50) on such animals.

 Once per day, you can cast [_animal allies_](/Spells.aspx?ID=863) as a divine innate spell, using your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. The creatures it summons are bats, rats, and wolves. At 5th level and every 2 levels thereafter, the spell is heightened by an additional level, to a maximum of a 9th-level _animal allies_ when you are 19th level.
name: Nocturnal Kindred
